category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 29 (Submission of Statement of Accounts)
contents: Article 29 (Submission of Statement of Accounts) ① At the end of each fiscal year, the Chairman of the Board shall prepare a statement of statements for that fiscal year without delay and undergo an accounting audit in accordance with the provisions of Article 43 (1) of the Public Institutions Management Act. Revised July 20, 2015, November 5, 2020, ② The following financial statements prepared in accordance with paragraph 1 shall be submitted to the Minister of Education by the end of February of the following year. Revised on July 20, 2015, 1. Financial statements (including the accounting auditor's audit opinion) and accompanying documents, 2. Other documents necessary to clarify the contents of the settlement, 3. Deleted on July 20, 2015 ., 4. Deleted July 20, 2015, ③ The settlement of foundation accounting is confirmed by resolution of the board of directors and approval by the Minister of Education.
